bug.summary: Configurable Istio Gateway for Notebook Controller is not working
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: Changing ISTIO_GATEWAY environment variable on notebook controller deployment isn't reflected on Istio VirtualService for notebook. It is still using default value of kubeflow/kubeflow-gateway. <denchmark-code>root@notebook-controller-deployment-7967d8b565-x5gvj:/# env|grep -i istio USE_ISTIO=true ISTIO_GATEWAY=istio-system/istio-gateway </denchmark-code>
